title: [Minecraft.net | MINECRAFT BUILDS]河岸高墙
author: Sinbad_Official
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Sinbad_Official 于 2020-6-26 08:00 编辑 

MINECRAFT BUILDSRiver’s Edge Wall
河岸高墙

Built by Zepheron
由Zepheron倾情制作

Jess Robinson


With it’s high imposing walls and inviting (yet ominous) stairs, Zepheron’s great wall on the edge of a river leaves us wondering what we will find inside. Perhaps it’s an old castle filled with gold? Perhaps a dangerous temple? Or maybe a grand mine entrance. We may never know...
巍峨的高墙，庄严（或许散发着不祥之气）的楼梯，Zepheron在河边建筑的高墙留给我们无限遐想，引人入胜，吸引着我们前往一探究竟。这是一个囤满了黄金的上古城堡？还是一个可怕的神庙？亦或是一个有着传说的矿井入口？我们都不得而知......
Now it’s your turn! What have you been building lately? Tell us all about it by sending some screenshots and information to FeatureMe@minecraft.net, and you might just see your creation featured here on Minecraft.net!
现在，是你的回合！你最近有没有建造出什么奇妙建筑？联系我们吧，只要附上一些它的照片和信息，然后把它发送到 FeatureMe@minecraft.net ，接着你的作品就有机会放在Minecraft.net上展示哦！



【Sinbad 译自官网 2020 年 06 月 25 日发布的 River’s Edge Wall；原作者 Jess Robinson】
【本文排版借助了：SPX】
